On time

Jul 13, 2014 • aloneindecember

From strangers to lust as fast as we could,
from endless conversations to  unequivocal love,
from lovers to completing each other,
from lust to imperative necessity, to routine.

From lovers to strangers even faster,
as if everything we lived had to be removed in order to live,
from endless conversations to monosyllables,
from lust do indifference, to being unknown,
from completeness to the crude emptiness that evolves me.

From strangers to lovers and return, over and over again.
Different faces telling the same stories,
falling and failing in the pursue of an ephemeral happiness.
I am not content.
